mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.name, r.description, r.match_type, r.pattern, r.response_template, r.priority, r.enabled, r.created_by, r.created_at, r.updated_at FROM message_rule r INNER JOIN group_rule_config grc ON r.id = grc.rule_id WHERE grc.group_id = #{groupId} AND r.enabled = TRUE AND grc.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY r.priority DESC, r.created_at ASC
